field_description.processed:
USHCA is excited to announce our upcoming seasonal Third Space Story Circle program! Join us for our Spring Story Circle as we dive into topics like cross-cultural understanding, language, and navigating the virtual world in 2024. With social media becoming an increasingly popular topic amongst policymakers, this Student Event will encourage students in our community to assess what social media means to them and how all citizens of the world can use virtual tools to become more connected.

The event is open to English and Chinese speaking students from all corners of the globe!
